mn120:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti, sīlena samannāgato hoti, sutena samannāgato hoti, cāgena samannāgato hoti, paññāya samannāgato hoti. → etthantare pāṭho syā1, syā2 potthakesu
mn120:17.8: bhāsate ca tapate ca → bhāsati ca tapati ca (s1-3, km) | bhāsati ca (pts1)
mn120:37.8: na katthaci upapajjatī”ti → na kuhiñci upapajjatīti (bj) | na katthaci uppajjati na kuhiñci uppajjatīti (pts1) | na kuhiñci upasampajja viharatīti. (mr)
mn120:37.16: upapatti → ito paraṃ bj potthake evampi dissati--anupada sodhana porisa dhammā,
